job.title: Software Engineer I - Tiger Institute
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: As a Software Engineer onsite at the Tiger Institute you will be assigned to a specific research focus wherein you will be involved in writing and configuring code to meet user interface specifications for new and upgraded solutions In this role you will be participating in the full development life cycle of software solutions including defining the needs of the client providing input for functional designing testing troubleshooting and documenting You will also implement designs by utilizing development languages and tools as per design specifications routine review of solutions suggest aesthetic improvements and participate in projectrelated sessions such as code reviews and project status meetings Additionally you will be at the forefront of technology migration rolling out cuttingedge tools to the larger developer community and involved in the new generation Continuous Integration Framework for an enterprise solution strongQualificationsstrong strongBasic Qualifications brstrongulli At least 4 years total combined higher education and related work experience includingliulli Bachelors Degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Software Engineering Computer Information Systems Information Technology or Information Systems or related field or equivalent work experience liulul strongPreferred Qualifications brbrstrongulli Experience in fullstack web development with an emphasis in CSS JavaScript HTML Python andor Ruby lili Familiarity with Oracle SQL Server lili Knowledge in Java and OOP design lili Experience or basic understanding of agile development liul strongExpectations brbrstrongulli Must live in or around the Columbia Missouri area lili Willing to work additional or irregular hours as needed and allowed by local regulations lili Work in accordance with corporate and organizational security policies and procedures understand personal role in safeguarding corporate and client assets and take appropriate action to prevent and report any compromises of security within scope of position lili Perform other responsibilities as assignedliul
